name: International Summit on Public Health and Preventive Medicine
content: We Cordially invite all International Participants to join the International Summit on Public Health and Preventive Medicine which is going to be held on October 07-08, 2024 in Dubai, UAE. the Conference impacts the advancements and technology trends in Public Health. The theme of the conference is â€œTowards new ways of improving public health".Guided by a line-up of expert speakers, the agenda will address some of the major issues related to Public Health, Preventive and Emergency Medicine, and those entering the Public Health system and examine the support needed to ensure that the public receives the best possible care and can look forward to a bright future.
